head.title: Contact Me
head.text-1: I'm available to collaborate on projects that require
head.strong-1: creativity and skills in design and frontend development
head.text-2: . Don't hesitate to get in touch with me!

contact.textarea-error: Please share your proposal before sending

guestbook.title: Guestbook
guestbook.text-1: I'd love to hear what you think. This
guestbook.text-2: for you to leave messages, ideas, or any words of encouragement.
guestbook.strong-2: Your participation makes this more special!
